resources.string:
1: Guess a letter

2: When a letter is pressed, it will be marked as either right or wrong on the keyboard 

3: If the guessed letter is right, it will be displayed above the keyboard. If it is wrong, the game will remove one body part from "Monty"

4: If all the correct letters are guessed, the game is won. If "Monty" loses all his body parts, the game is lost
